title: The Poro King
body:
When is The Poro King coming out?? I've been waiting so long. I'm asking because I love poros.{{summoner:30}} 

Thanks, CRAZIGIRL7

replies.body: Its going to be on the 16th, but in NA time. I just found out.
There's nothing to say when the Poro King mode will be coming out on live but, since it is associated with Snowdown, it will most likely be the 16th when Snowdown starts (like others have said).
They even posted on the site... http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/snowdown-2014/teaser.html
Sorry, I didn't know. Thanks anyway :)
I think it will be when snowdown begins, on the 16th
